entry.content:
Here are the slides with notes: Handout from my presentation. For those following along with Twitter here are the results of the poll:
[][]

I really enjoyed the conference, and want to thank everyone that was involved at putting it on. It was very well run (although I didn't win the MacBook Air door prize... :-).
